attributes.action: Allow vaccinated people to travel and enter the UK without test or restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: Covid will be with us for decades with new variants arising every year. If the government continue down this path of keeping overly strict restrictions in place then we will not be able to travel freely for generations.
attributes.background: It is ludicrous, that one of worlds most vaccinated countries also has one of the most restrictive travel policies. The UK government does not even recognise, or give any less entry restrictions to those holding its own NHS vaccination passports. Families being kept apart unable to burden the costs.
